==Useful info==
'''Giant slugs''' have high HP and a strong melee attack, but their slow speed and lack of AC and EV render them mostly harmless. They're often found in [[the Lair]].

==Tips and tricks==
You know how [[bat]]s like to hit you then retreat before you can retaliate? Do the same thing to these creatures.

==History==
Giant slugs were removed in [[0.15]].
